meanings.definition: The quality or state of being polite and well-mannered.
meanings.sent1: Her mannerliness impressed everyone at the party.
meanings.sent2: Showing mannerliness is important in social situations.
meanings.sent3: His mannerliness was so extreme that he even thanked the automated voice on the phone.
meanings.sent4: The mannerliness of the old house was evident in its well-preserved decor.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's mannerliness set a positive example for the students.

meanings.definition: Behavior that is considerate and respectful towards others.
meanings.sent1: The mannerliness of his actions made everyone feel valued.
meanings.sent2: Practicing mannerliness leads to better relationships with others.
meanings.sent3: The dog's mannerliness towards the new kitten was heartwarming.
meanings.sent4: The mannerliness of the team towards each other contributed to their success.
meanings.sent5: Her mannerliness in listening to others made her a trusted friend.
